content: "Please continue" is a phrase that is used to request that the person speaking or performing an action should continue with what they are doing without interruption. According to the web search results provided, it is an imperative that instructs the person to finish what they are saying and then stop to listen [[1](https://ell.stackexchange.com/questions/208652/please-continue-or-please-complete-your-sentence)]. The phrase can be used in various contexts such as in conversation, in writing, or
